message.body: Hey. How has Louie been this week? Were you able to ride during the week at all?
Hey, welcome back! I rode sat-mon. He felt extra stiff on one cold day but he's been his usual good self. Hope you had a great trip!
And tomorrow is your day too, right?
Yup - fri/sun/mon is still good for me if it works for you. I might not be able to ride Sunday this week, but I'll let you know when I find out for sure.
